title: Server Crash
body:
Did anybody elses game just crash a few seconds ago like...at 6:15 or so perhaps!?
I was playing jg {{champion:121}} and I'm in the NA server but...the game just said "reconnecting" yet it never did and my internet connection is just fine...anyone know whats going on... I was able to get back in to the client but it said Server was busy....Is my game still going on or what?... ._.

....Fk I think blue buff killed me

replies.body: Are you still experiencing any issues?  The patch rolled out this morning and may have caused a hiccup in your case.  Our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page will provide updates on potential downtime, issues, or specific queues being disabled.  Let me know and I'd be happy to help!
The servers were taken offline to deploy Patch 6.15. They are online once again, patch and play!
